description: PrismCheckpoint â€“ TypeScript/Vite project leveraging multiple Coinbase SDKs.

@coinbase/onchainkit.why: Base-first UI components and helpers for onchain applications.

@coinbase/wallet-sdk.why: Integration and management of Coinbase Wallet connections.

@coinbase/smart-wallet.why: Account abstraction and smart wallet flows.

@coinbase/cdp-sdk.why: Access to Coinbase Developer Platform services.

@coinbase/x402.why: HTTP-native x402 payment and paywalled API flows.
